Title: Group Portrait with a Lady
Writer: Heinrich Böll (novel), Heinrich Böll (screenplay collaborator), Jürgen Kolbe (screenplay), Aleksandar Petrovic (screenplay)
Actors: Romy Schneider, Brad Dourif, Michel Galabru, Vadim Glowna
Plot: The story follows the life of a regular German women Leni Gruyten during 1930s and 1940s. Through her interactions with friends, family and other people she knows, the regular folks' perception of the Nazi era is shown.
